CustomField.formula:
"In certain circumstances you or your supervisor may request that public access to your thesis be restricted for a defined time period. This restriction, known as an embargo, is normally only for a designated period, usually 12 months or two years." + BR() + BR() +
"If your embargo request is approved by the Chair of the Board of Graduate Research, your thesis will be held in a secure, inaccessible area of the Repository. At the conclusion of the approved embargo period, the thesis will revert to the open access repository unless a new application to extend the period of restricted access has been approved by the Chair, BGR." + BR() + BR() +
"Reason/s for the embargo (Select all that apply)"
CustomField.label: Request to restrict access if applicable
